articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Tesla sales fall by 49% in Europe even as the electric vehicle market grows - ABC News
articles.description: European sales of Tesla electric vehicles tumbled 49% in the first two months of the year even as overall sales of EVs grew
articles.content: FRANKFURT, Germany -- European sales of Tesla electric vehicles tumbled 49% in the first two months of the year compared with a year earlier even as overall sales of EVs grew, according to the Europe… [+1730 chars]
